        dest - destination coordinate

      • addStationsAroundBoundaries

        public java.util.List<Station> addStationsAroundBoundaries(java.util.List<Station> stations,
                                                           com.sothawo.mapjfx.Coordinate origin,
                                                           com.sothawo.mapjfx.Coordinate dest,
                                                           double maxDistKm)
        Fill a list with stations with potentially missing stations around the extreme points.
        Parameters:
        stations - the preexisting list of stations that got parsed along a route or line
        origin - first coordinate/origin point
        dest - last coordinate/destination point
        maxDistKm - radius to look for stations in km
        Returns:
        the appended list of stations
